definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

pinyin: Jia1 li4 lu:e4 tan4 ce4 qi4
ban4 dao3 ti3 tan4 ce4 qi4

sentences.english: I'd love to send a probe in there to find out what's really going on.
sentences.chinese: 我很想送一個探測器去那裏，看看到底發生了什麼。

sentences.english: A new optical system for infrared two-color detector was designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了適於紅外雙色探測器的光學系統。

sentences.english: All four infrared detectors aboard WISE were used to make this image.
sentences.chinese: 船上所有四個紅外探測器被用來獲得這一圖片。

sentences.english: Now the temperature is adjusted on which the infrared-detector responsed.
sentences.chinese: 現在溫度調整上的紅外探測器Responsed。

sentences.english: The invention discloses an ultra-thin silica-based particle detector and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種超薄硅基粒子探測器及其製備方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, A method for measuring the speed of sound in air by means of a new sound wave prober was described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了用改進的聲波探測器在空氣中測定聲速的方法。

sentences.english: He was a member of the team that worked on the voyage of Mariner Nine to Mars.
sentences.chinese: 他是水手九號火星探測器研製小組成員。

sentences.english: The image - dissector scanner is another heavily used and very successful low light level detector.
sentences.chinese: 析象管掃描器是另一種常用而且很成功的微光探測器。

sentences.english: These generated particles then create patterns of light that the detectors can distinguish.
sentences.chinese: 這些產生的粒子當時產生探測器能夠識別的光圖樣。

sentences.english: Each is its own probe into the process engine.
sentences.chinese: 每個都是過程引擎中它自己的探測器。

sentences.english: In this paper two structures had been proposed to resolve two problems of the resonant cavity enhanced photodetectors(RCEPD).
sentences.chinese: 針對RCE光電探測器存在的問題提出兩種解決方案。

sentences.english: This pole like a detector, suit to be the picture for the subject.
sentences.chinese: 這個燈杆很象探測器，正好可以做題圖。

sentences.english: Detectors have weatherproof housings for reliable operation in harsh conditions.
sentences.chinese: 探測器有防水外殼，能在惡劣條件下正常運行。

sentences.english: Enclosed is some additional technical information on the probers.
sentences.chinese: 茲附上探測器之附加技術資料。

sentences.english: The Teknetics is a new high-performance multi-purpose professional grade metal detector.
sentences.chinese: 新型的高效能的，多用途的專業級別的黃金探測器。

sentences.english: The head is a photo-acoustic detector using a closed air-cell and a pressure transducer.
sentences.chinese: 探頭爲聲光探測器，使用密封的空氣室和壓力傳感器。

definition: moon landing/to land on the moon
to cut ties/to disconnect/out of touch
